desc.en: Chinatsu gifts Sensei a voucher to stay at an upscale ryokan, but the voucher is to stay at a family facility instead of an individual one by mistake. Sensei and Chinatsu enjoy the baths together and have a great time.
desc.jp: Chinatsu gifts Sensei a voucher to stay at an upscale ryokan, but the voucher is to stay at a family facility instead of an individual one by mistake. Sensei and Chinatsu enjoy the baths together and have a great time.
desc.zh_cn: 为了报答老师，{cf千夏}把一张高级旅馆住宿券送给老师。虽然由于{cf千夏}的失误，老师没能泡到单人温泉，但老师和{cf千夏}后来还是一起在家庭汤屋中度过了美好的时光。

name.en: Hot Springs Training: Rest and Relaxation
name.jp: Hot Springs Training: Rest and Relaxation

desc.en: Sensei reserves a foot bath with great therapeutic effects for Nodoka and her sprained ankle. Nodoka and Sensei have a great time together while enjoying the foot bath.
desc.jp: Sensei reserves a foot bath with great therapeutic effects for Nodoka and her sprained ankle. Nodoka and Sensei have a great time together while enjoying the foot bath.
desc.zh_cn: 为了让{cf和香}的脚伤能够尽快痊愈，老师替她预约了一间据说能缓和疼痛的足浴汤屋。{cf和香}和老师两人一边泡着足浴，一边度过了一段美好的时光。

long.jp: レッドウィンター連邦学園
